alert.note: Alert for West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 3:28AM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with isolated higher totals on favored aspects. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
